XII arguments drawn out of the Scripture wherein the commonly-received opinion touching the deity of the Holy Spirit is clearly and fully refuted : to which is prefixed a letter tending to the same purpose, written to a member of the Parliament ... / by John Biddle. Biddle, John, 1615-1662.
[16], 35 p.
[s.n.], [London] printed : 1647.
Place of publication suggested by Wing. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
